snippet.title: Hidden Expedition: The Pearl of Discord
snippet.description:
Eipix Entertainment presents the next pulse-pounding adventure in the classic series: Hidden Expedition!

H.E.L.P. has summoned you to a pearl farm to investigate the theft of a priceless pearl that was once owned by Marco Polo himself. Unfortunately, the acrobatic thief poses a dangerous challenge for you. Armed with new tools from your H.E.L.P. companions, follow the thief's trail across the world! Take back the pearl from a dark organization, before it falls into the wrong hands in this daring hidden-object puzzle adventure game!
